name: Humanity Hero
description:
The year is 2134. In 2107 the government detected a meteor coming to earth.

This is where you start, in this chamber will enter two candidates for your evaluation, remember our goal, and keep it in mind when choosing the candidate.

Whoever is chosen will have a free pass to the bunker, the other candidate will also serve a noble role.

Remember, the future of humanity is in your hands.
